headline: Mondelez International (MDLZ): Evaluating Valuation as Cocoa Costs Rise and Supply Chain Strategy Shifts
summary: Mondelez International (MDLZ) is gaining attention as rising cocoa futures, driven by concerns over crop yields in West Africa, are impacting production costs and prompting the company to diversify sourcing into Southeast Asia. See our latest analysis for Mondelez International. Mondelez International’s latest moves come amid a roughly 6% dip in Q3, as rising cocoa costs and supply chain concerns out of West Africa weighed on investor sentiment.
